alert.note: Alert for North Itasca; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 5:01PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Itasca County through 530 PM CDT... At 501 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Marcell, or 19 miles northwest of Grand Rapids, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grand Rapids, Cohasset, Coleraine, Pokegama Dam, Gunn and Pokegama Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
